issue_comments.author: sanderux
issue_comments.body:
our use case for changing speed would be 
- from an onboard computer monitoring vehicle behavior and detecting a requirement for more speed
- custom behavior: change flight setting from efficient to performance and back
- custom behavior: Quick RTL / Bird strike avoidance

So for us it is not so much a mission setting but a way for external systems (or perhaps in the future through QGC) of defining the vehicles speed.
